full_threads.body:
@rica I have done this one. Please add +3hrs

Thanks

Perfect Heath thank you.

They're now just needing it in the following format please:
If he can send it through as a high res PDF 30mm Bleed at final size or 50%

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
<https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/>


Duracube will be closing for our annual shut down on 18th December
2020 and we'll be returning on 6th January 2021.



On Thu, Jan 14, 2021 at 5:27 PM Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Stella,

Ok sure, please see attached. Let me know what you think?

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

>
> Thanks Heath, sorry could you send one more draft version please - either without the icons altogether, or with them half the size they are, and make the values text bigger again. (Sorry they cant hang it lower because of high forklifts that go through that space the whole time - just to complicate things even more!)

>
> Ok sure, please see attached.
>

>

>

>

> Heath Maguire
